website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you're looking for something relatively inexpensive, although this kit may limit your overall bartending capabilities.
pros: Stainless steel set includes a shaker, ice tongs, and three pourer spouts
10 pieces in all, including a stand to hold them all
Set comes with a recipe ebook and an ebook on building your own home bar
cons: This set is missing items that are normally found in other bartender kits, such as a muddler and a stirring spoon
Shaker is pretty small and made from thin steel

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner set.
customer_reviews.text: Great price for what you get, easy to clean and doesn't take up too much space, and it is user-friendly
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Impressive gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter recently bought a new bar cart and I wanted to get something to accessorize it. When she opened the box she became very excited. The bartender's tool kit had everything she would ever need to make proper cocktails. The kit is well made and makes her bar cart look very professional.
customer_reviews.author: GermanGreek

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Excellent basic set for a small bar. Everything is contained in one location so you never have to hunt for the pieces. It is made very well and I also use it as an accent piece on the bar.
customer_reviews.author: Perry M

customer_reviews.title: Very Compact!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for a gift, it is compact yet has EVERYTHING you will need to make a mixed drink! We are very happy with this purchase and the it is nicely priced!
customer_reviews.author: Jane, Lake Havasu City

customer_reviews.title: Well satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I love a good martini......shaken not stirred! And this mixer is just perfect, along with all of the bar equipment I got with it. A great deal, good quality and nice looking. I'm satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: DRRN333

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I was very please with this product! My stepdad just built a beautiful bar for the back room and needed some tools, I came across this. It was the best thing for a nice at home bar! Everything you need to make drinks and it comes with a organizer to keep everything neat. The stainless steel makes it look very sleek. I highly recommend this product

customer_reviews.title: Great for a mini bar
customer_reviews.text: White Russians and perverted Irishmen shots haven't been better. This set is great. The shaker seals well and pours excellent. all the extra amenities are a great addition to a mini bar. The stainless cleans well in between uses.

customer_reviews.title: I ordered and was super excited about the price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and was super excited about the price. Got to my house sooner then promised but when I opened it was so disappointing to find out not only was the ice cube tongs not in the box but also the corkscrew and I only received one of the 3 liquor pourer spouts. Great quality metal but super disheartening that everything was not in the box.
customer_reviews.author: sephen wilson

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Great
customer_reviews.text: Has the basic tools to make a cocktail. Product is a bit flimsy. The cocktail shake is thin but i guess good enough for starters. I havent used it yet. I hope it doesnt Rust when i wash it Like what happened to one of the reviewers. I have just Set it up. I Like the base metal to keep everything organized. Though base is not stable enough and i had to buy to buy those little silicones to put in the bottom to keep it stable. If youre looking for a more professional cocktail bar, this is definitely NOT the one You should buy
customer_reviews.author: Just Flow :-)

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need for your bar
customer_reviews.text: This set is everything you need for your at-home bar. Most of the time, when I am making drinks for myself, I never use this set, but when I have guests over, it is a magnificent showpiece. The bottle opener comes in handy when you can't find your regular one. After a few years, these have yet to tarnish and still look brand new—a great gift for your inspiring bartender.
customer_reviews.author: Wiseblue

customer_reviews.title: A Good Functional Kit
customer_reviews.text: My only disappointment is that the Shaker wasn't the "standard" size I already have - I have an antique pewter one that actually has the recipes to old drinks like "Side Car" that belonged to my grandparents. This one will mix a couple of drinks no issues. The other items are great in the set and good for the use in a home bar.
customer_reviews.author: E. Doyle-Propst

customer_reviews.title: Love this set!
customer_reviews.text: Love this item! Bought it as a gift for my husband to go with his bar and he loves it. Looks like a professional set ! Customer service from this company was also great, they emailed me as soon as i received the item to make sure it met all my expectations. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Mckibbin

customer_reviews.title: Shaker gets sealed shut
customer_reviews.text: Almost every time I use the shaker, the two lids get sealed onto the base. This is problematic because in order to eventually open it, I spill out half of my drink. I once spent an hour trying to take the small lid off the top running it under hot and cold water over and over again. Wouldn't recommend for this reason...
customer_reviews.author: Cormac

customer_reviews.title: 5/5 would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love the shaker set and stand. It looks just as imaged, no missing parts for it upon arrival, no damage, packaged really good, tight, and safe. As for the seal when shaking, remember what you put in there because if it creates any bit of carbonation or you shake too much it will seal tighter than normal but I haven't had any leaks and that's great.

product_meta.title: Bar Set by Naava – Stainless Steel 10 Piece Home Cocktail Mixology Tool Kit – With Bartender's Professional Shaker, Strainer, Jigger, Liquor Pourers and More – Attractive Gift Box and 100% Guarantee
feature_bullets: MAKE COCKTAILS LIKE A PRO: If you want to mix the perfect drink in the comfort of your own home, you need the right equipment. This set contains all the tools you need to craft hundreds of different cocktails, from classic speakeasy drinks all the way to innovative modern creations.

10 PIECE BARTENDING SET: This kit contains all the supplies that you’d find in the best cocktail bars around the world, including a shaker, ice tongs, strainer, measuring jigger, corkscrew, beer opener and a perfectly designed stand to hold and display your new tools.

THE PERFECT GIFT FOR COCKTAIL FANS: This stainless-steel cocktail set comes neatly packaged in a handsome gift box. It’s the perfect gift for the cocktail fan in your life, and you might even get some nice drinks out of it!

INCLUDES THREE POURER SPOUTS: Unlike many competing sets, we’ve also included three pourer spouts. These help spirits and liqueurs pour smoothly, eliminate spillage and mess, and help you to measure out your ingredients perfectly for better tasting cocktails.

100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: This dishwasher proof cocktail set has been precisely manufactured from high quality stainless steel, and is built to last. If you aren’t happy with it, simply send it back to us for a full refund.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars207 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
